Join the Panlist

Please enter your full name, Yale email address, and NetID to be added to our panlist.

To become a member, you must be present at a minumum of one-half of each semester's offered lecture or speaker events, and sign in each time with a QR code containing your NetID. You must also compete in the YUDI Competition in order to remain eligible. If you have any questions, please email yaleudi@gmail.com.
